properties.entry: SELECT LOCATION , ROOM_NAME , ROOM_TITLE , PRICE , STAR , FILE_PATH , CHANGE_NAME , ROOM_NO FROM ROOMS R JOIN FILES F USING(ROOM_NO) JOIN ROOMS_REVIEW USING(ROOM_NO) WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y' AND F.STATUS = 'Y' AND FILE_LEVEL = 0

SELECT ROOM_RESERVE , START_DATE , END_DATE , PERSON_RESERVE , RESERVE_NUM , RESERVE_STATE , ROOM_NO , ROOM_NAME , ADDRESS , START_TIME , END_TIME , FILE_PATH , CHANGE_NAME FROM RESERVATION JOIN ROOMS USING(ROOM_NO) JOIN FILES USING(ROOM_NO) WHERE GUEST = ? AND FILE_LEVEL = 0
